comments:
I created a Java Bean with DBCS character and ran into the following exception:

IWAB0399E Error in generating Java from WSDL:  java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: /opt/rad_install/rad_0514/eclipse/workspace/TestDBCSProj/WebContent/wsdl/ ?h??.wsdl
    java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: /opt/rad_install/rad_0514/eclipse/workspace/TestDBCSProj/WebContent/wsdl/ ?h??.wsdl
    at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:567)
    at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:464)
    at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:413)
    at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLEntityManager.setupCurrentEntity(XMLEntityManager.java:968)
    at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLVersionDetector.determineDocVersion(XMLVersionDetector.java:184)
    at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(XML11Configuration.java:798)
    at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(XML11Configuration.java:764)
    at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XMLParser.parse(XMLParser.java:148)
    at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.DOMParser.parse(DOMParser.java:250)
    at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl.parse(DocumentBuilderImpl.java:292)
    at org.apache.axis.utils.XMLUtils.newDocument(XMLUtils.java:369)
    at org.apache.axis.utils.XMLUtils.newDocument(XMLUtils.java:420)
    at org.apache.axis.wsdl.symbolTable.SymbolTable.populate(SymbolTable.java:482)
    at org.apache.axis.wsdl.gen.Parser$WSDLRunnable.run(Parser.java:361)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)


I have attached a war file that can be used to recreate this problem.

Created an attachment (id=41667)
War file with DBCS characters

Peter, this appears to be the same breed of issue (if not quite identical) in the Axis emitter as reported in bug 131241. URLs must contain only US-ASCII characters, meaning we need to either find a way to drive Axis such that it does not use file or platform URLs computed from filesystem or Eclipse workspace paths, or try to encode the URLs.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 131241 ***
